name: Box Buddies
description:
Box BuddiesA cooperative puzzle platformer with elephants

Grab, lift, pull, push and jump over boxes in order to reach your goal.

The colored boxes are linked between the two worlds. When you move a box the equivalent box in the other world will move too.

  • 19 challenging levels
  • Controller support
  • Suited for all ages
  • Communicate with your friend via emoticons
  • Requires forward thinking and communication skills

Play together with a friend and solve all levels.
